function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited food supplies due to poverty and unemployment","Impact":"Worsening of SDG2 goals and increased risk of malnutrition and hunger","Mitigation":"Increased aid and subsidies, support for agriculture and food supply chains","Technologies":"Agricultural technology, supply chain management systems","People":"People in developing nations, especially in Africa and Latin America","Owner":"International organizations, governments, NGOs"},{"Description":"Reduced access to healthcare due to underinvestment and lack of resilience","Impact":"Challenges in achieving SDG3 goals, increased risk of disease transmission and higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure, training of healthcare workers, development of resilient healthcare systems","Technologies":"Telemedicine, medical equipment, healthcare information systems","People":"People in both developed and developing nations","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Fueling of populism and nationalism","Impact":"Undermining of global cooperation and support for international aid","Mitigation":"Promotion of global solidarity, diplomatic efforts to address populist sentiments, education and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Communication platforms, social media monitoring tools","People":"Global citizens, policymakers, international organizations","Owner":"Diplomatic and educational institutions"}]}
